short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the publish date on news site.
short.zh_TW: 在新聞網站上顯示新聞日期

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension show the publish date on news website.
If the date is successfully detected, the date will be displayed on the top right corner of website.
Click on ribbon can remove it form the website.

There are the ribbon colors meaning:
Green: news within 3 days
Yellow: news within 1 week
Orange: news within 30 days
Red: news over than 30 days

You can set the block/allow websites in extension options.

NOTE !!!!!!
1. No promise to support EVERY news website. Tested on some popular news website, e.g.: BBC, CNN, etc.
2. Due to time zone issues, the date sometimes have a one-day error.
